en.emailInvalid: Can't send password reset email due to invalid email address.
en.emailTaken: Can't send password reset email. More than one username is registered with this email address.
en.emailEmpty: Can't send password reset email. There is no associated email address for this username.
en.tokenShortError: Token supplied is non-existent or too short.
en.tokenExpiredError: Token has expired (2 hour limit). Please obtain a new email via the login page.
en.tokenMismatchError: Token not matched to any user, maybe overridden by a newer request or already used. Password update failed.
en.passwordEmailCatchall: An Error occurred when attempting to send a retrieve password email.
en.resetPasswordEmailInfo: An email has been sent to the associated address. Use the link in the email within 2 hours to reset your password.
en.passwordResetCatchall: An Error occurred when resetting a password.
en.resetPasswordEmailBody:
User: $1 - you may use this link to reset your xiView account's password, within 2 hours of receiving this email
$2
en.genDatabaseError: Sorry, there has been a database error. Alert your Xi administrator.
en.databaseConnectError:
An Error occurred when attempting to connect to the Xi database.
If this continues please contact your Xi Administrator.
en.userDatabaseError: An Error occurred when reading a user's details in the database.
en.updatePermissionError: You don't have permission to update the details of another user
en.userDatabaseUpdateCatchall: An Error occurred when updating a user's details in the database.
en.deletePermissionError: You don't have permission to delete a user
en.deletedFailedEmailWarning: User deleted but failed to send email to registered address
en.deletedMissingEmailWarning: User deleted but user had no valid email address to send deletion email to
en.deleteCatchallError: An Error occurred when attempting to delete the user
en.deleteUserEmailBody: Your account on Xi was deleted either by yourself or by an administrator. You can re-register by visiting the Xi registration page.
en.newUserUniqueEmailError: < The email address $1 is already in use. Please choose another.
en.newUserUniqueNameError: < The username $1 is already taken. Please choose another.
en.newUserEmailInfo: New user $1 added. A confirmation email has been sent, you MUST click the link in that email to give consent to us storing you're data in accordance with our Privacy Statement. You will not be able to log in until you have done so.
en.newUserErrorCatchall: An Error occurred when adding a new user to the database
en.newUserEmailBody:
A request has been received to register this email address with xiVIEW.

Please read the following text and click the following link to confirm your acceptance of our privacy policy.

Privacy Policy

xiVIEW only asks for and retains email addresses and no other personal data. Email addresses are used only for resetting passwords and not for marketing or bulk communication.
Your uploaded data is kept private; we will not make use of your data or provide access to others.
We will use the number of user accounts and number of datasets uploaded when we report usage statistics.
Cookies are used to record that you have logged in, and, optionally, to store the configuration of the filters in the 'My Data' page.
This is a beta/development version of this website and logging is currently enabled on the web server, we will only use this for debugging purposes.

If that's ok, then click this link: I Accept These Terms
en.confirmationResendEmailBody:
A request has been received to register this email address with xiVIEW.

Please read the following text and click the following link to confirm your acceptance of our privacy policy.

Privacy Policy

xiVIEW only asks for and retains email addresses and no other personal data. Email addresses are used only for resetting passwords and not for marketing or bulk communication.
Your uploaded data is kept private; we will not make use of your data or provide access to others.
We will use the number of user accounts and number of datasets uploaded when we report usage statistics.
Cookies are used to record that you have logged in, and, optionally, to store the configuration of the filters in the 'My Data' page.
This is a beta/development version of this website and logging is currently enabled on the web server, we will only use this for debugging purposes.

If that's ok, then click this link: I Accept These Terms
en.clientNameValidationInfo: Between 4 and 16 Alphanumeric characters only please
en.clientEmailValidationInfo: You must use a valid email address
en.clientRevokeSuperuser:
This change will revoke your own superuser role and cannot be undone (by yourself).
Are You Sure?
en.clientResetPassword:
This will send a link to the user's email to reset their password.
Are You Sure?
en.clientDeleteUser:
This user's email will be deleted, and their account and associated data will be disabled.
Restoration will require you to re-enter and update the email address, and then issue a password reset request. The account will re-activate once the user has reset their password.
Are You Sure?
en.clientDeleteYourself:
Your e-mail address will be deleted, your account and associated data will be disabled, and you will be returned to the Xi login page. Only contacting a Xi Admin can undo this action.
Are You Sure?
en.GDPRacceptance: Thank you, your acceptance of Xi's privacy terms has been noted
en.canSeePublicSearches: Can see other users' public searches
en.superuserRequired: Superuser status required to change this
